name: Dungeons & Adventures Prototype
description:
Hello and welcome to my prototype Dungeons & Adventures.

I made a prototype of a game to get information what you the player want exactly.  In my past I developed different games which didn't get played so this time I take a diferent route. Sorry if the game is not fully polished.

Currently my only ideas are :

  • making a game with a big map. You go fighting in the dungeons and you spend your cash in the hub buying upgrades
  • Making maybe something like archero. You have different levels and the goal is to go to the highest level. On the way you get upgrades and the monsters to hunt?

Thank you for your attention!
